verbs.description: verbalize (third-person singular simple present verbalizes, present participle verbalizing, simple past and past participle verbalized)

entries.meaning: (transitive) To speak or to use words to express.
examples: Bill became tongue-tied and could not verbalize his thoughts in the presence of the girl he had a crush on.

entries.meaning: (transitive, grammar) To adapt (a word of another part of speech) as a verb.
